config.dontbreakme.title: Don't Break Me Configuration
config.dontbreakme.general.mode.tooltip: Whitelist blocks to only allow mining those blocks or blacklist blocks to prevent mining those blocks
config.dontbreakme.general.creative.tool: If enabled, mod will work in creative mode
config.dontbreakme.general.whitelist.too: Blocks not in this list cannot be mined
config.dontbreakme.general.blacklist.too: Blocks in this list cannot be mined
config.dontbreakme.general.list.caption: Add the name of the blocks in your language. You can also use fragments of block names such as 'Ore' to do all ores.
